GSD.product_version: versions from v5.10.133 to before v5.10.133
GSD.description:
efi/x86: use naked RET on mixed mode call wrapper

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.133 by commit 5779e2f0cc241d76ae309e2f6f52168204e93fdb, it was introduced in version v5.10.133 by commit c9eb5dcdc8f4a848b45b97725f5a2b8d324bb31a. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: efi/x86: use naked RET on mixed mode call wrapper
